tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE gene_expression_data (
  gene_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  gene_name VARCHAR(50),
  expression_level DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE sample_data (
  sample_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sample_name VARCHAR(50),
  species VARCHAR(50),
  tissue_type VARCHAR(50),
  expression_value DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE comparative_analysis (
  analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  gene_id INT,
  sample_id INT,
  comparison_result VARCHAR(50),
  FOREIGN KEY (gene_id) REFERENCES gene_expression_data(gene_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (sample_id) REFERENCES sample_data(sample_id)
)

CREATE TABLE gene_data (
  gene_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  gene_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  expression_level FLOAT,
  species_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (species_id) REFERENCES species_data(species_id)
);

CREATE TABLE sample_data (
  sample_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  gene_id INT,
  sample_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  expression_value FLOAT,
  FOREIGN KEY (gene_id) REFERENCES gene_data(gene_id)
);

CREATE TABLE analysis_results (
  result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  analysis_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  analysis_date DATE,
  result_summary TEXT,
  sample_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (sample_id) REFERENCES sample_data(sample_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ExpressionData (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    gene_id INT NOT NULL,
    experiment_id INT NOT NULL,
    expression_value FLOAT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (gene_id) REFERENCES GeneExpressions(gene_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (experiment_id) REFERENCES Experiments(experiment_id)
);
